videos.title: Kiki's Delivery Service - Trailer
videos.desc: Luyện nghe tiếng Anh qua trailer phim hoạt hình Ghibli.

segments.text: If things don't work out you can always come home and come back a failure
Wow look at this city I'm Kiki and I'm a witch
Do you think you can deliver this by tonight?
Cool witch!
What's wrong with me?
I meet a lot of people and at first everything seems to be going okay
But then I start feeling like such an outsider
It's a major insult we fly with our spirit
That same spirit is what makes me paint and makes your friend bake but we each need to find our own inspiration Kiki

videos.title: YOUR NAME English Trailer (2016) Anime Movie
videos.desc: Luyện nghe qua trailer anime nổi tiếng Your Name.

segments.text: The day,
a star fell.
It was almost like,
like seeing something out of a dream.
Nothing more or less,
than a breathtaking view.
Wanna hit the café later?
Thanks, but i got to go to work.
I can't stand this place anymore.
It`s too small and townie.
Please make me a handsome Tokyo boy in my next life!
Where...?
Now that you`ve mentioned, I do feel like I've been having weird dreams lately.
I could dream about someone else's life?
What is this?
This is...
Could this mean...
In our dreams that girl and I...
...We're switching places?!
There's one thing I'm certain of...
If we see each other, we'll definitely know right away.
I was planning to tell you, that wherever you are in the world,
I swear that I'll find you again no matter what.
Who are you?
Who are you?
Could I ask you...
...Your Name?

videos.title: TOM & JERRY - Official Trailer
videos.desc: Cuộc chiến thế kỷ giữa Tom và Jerry tại khách sạn sang trọng nhất New York.

segments.text: After a lifetime of being the world's most famous enemies
Tom and Jerry are about to start over
in the big city
This hotel has been host to four presidents three popes two kings and we are about to host the wedding of the century
Do you think you are qualified to take on this position
I shine under pressure like a diamond Or Rihanna
One other thing We have a mouse problem With a what now
I will catch it sir
Oh wow This is so detailed
We could hire an exterminator or we can leverage millions of years of predatory evolution
If a picture of this mouse is tweeted out to InstaBookFace or Ticky Tok we will be ruined
No sir That is not gonna happen That rodent is toast
I will not let this hotel be ruined by a cat and a mouse
He is toying with us
I think I might have just pulled this off Really

videos.title: Talking About Your Job | Intermediate Business English
videos.desc: Hội thoại tiếng Anh thương mại về chủ đề công việc và môi trường công sở.

segments.text: How is the 9 to 5 treating you
It has been hectic but good
How about you How is work at Blue Corp
Oh you know it is the usual grind
I work as a project manager there so it is all about keeping the ship afloat
Lots of deadlines to meet
That sounds like a tough gig
How do you handle all the stress
Well you have gotta roll with the punches Mike
I am lucky to have a supportive team
They say Teamwork makes the dream work
Speaking of your team how are your co workers Any interesting characters
He is always cracking jokes lightening the mood
And what about your boss
My boss Mr Johnson is a bit of a tough nut to crack
You know what they say When the cat is away the mice will play
He is pretty laid back which is a nice change of pace
I am a software engineer
I spend most of my day coding and debugging
Software engineer That is some serious brainpower stuff
It is a passion turned profession
Speaking of RollTech what is the company culture like there
We have flexible hours and they encourage creativity
We are actually revamping our website giving it a fresh look and improved functionality
But like they say No pain no gain
I am part of a team developing a new app for streamlining project management
It is a game changer Emily

videos.title: A Dolphin Show Debate
videos.desc: Cuộc tranh luận thú vị về việc xem biểu diễn cá heo và quyền lợi động vật.

segments.text: Wow I really enjoyed watching that lovely dolphin show
Those dolphins did great tricks
I felt sorry for them
Why did they have to do those tricks
It was great fun to watch the dolphin show was it not
But they do not belong here do they
Maybe not but without them this park will be boring
It still does not make it right to make them do tricks
But we will not be able to watch them closely or touch them on the nose if we send them back into the wild
Do you want people to touch your nose every day
Do you want to do the same tricks over and over again
All right you have made your point loud and clear
We should be kinder to dolphins
Yes because they are a part of nature just like us

videos.title: What day is it today? - Easy Dialogue
videos.desc: Hội thoại tiếng Anh cơ bản về các ngày trong tuần và rủ bạn đi chơi.

segments.text: Can you play baseball this afternoon
What day is it today
It is Wednesday
Sorry I cannot
I have a piano lesson
Let us play on Friday
Sounds good
